attributes.action: Change the rules for the 2008 bus pass so that anyone currently getting free bus travel before 0930 still gets it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, as someone partially sighted, I get free bus travel before 0930. After April 1st 2008, I won't. This will mean that I'm going to have to quite alot of money per month if I'm working.
